mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rufini, Mathieu Rene
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Is Austrian receiver of duties in Belgium; wants information of brother Jean Baptiste, Baron de Rufini, who went to America in 1732 or 1735; wants Jefferson to search for him; might be in Montreal, Quebec, Boston or New England; thinks he made fortune by marrying American woman; if dead, wants certificate of death.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1805 May 18, Brune, Moravia to [Thomas Jefferson], n.p.
